description:
The Fujiwara clan were a dominant force in the politics of Heian era Japan. So much so that even military powerhouses like the Minamoto brothers turned to them for patronage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koko wa Ougon Paradise, Oushuu Fujiwara-shi!
This Is the Golden Paradise! The Fujiwaras of Oshu!
ここは黄金パラダイス, 奥州藤原氏!
